feed.title: StarWarden Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for StarWarden: v1.1.0
entry.content:
Thanks to @pemontto for the fixes!

Recent Changes:

  • Updates for newer Linkwarden instances by @pemontto in https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/pull/21
  • chore(deps): bump tqdm from 4.67.0 to 4.67.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/pull/20

Changes since 1.0.0

  • ci(docker): update workflow for versioned releases by @rtuszik in https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/pull/9
  • chore(deps): bump python from 3.11-slim to 3.12-slim by @dependabot in https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/pull/8
  • readme & ci changes by @rtuszik in https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/pull/10
  • docs: minor edits to README by @rtuszik in https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/pull/11
  • chore(deps): bump pygithub from 2.4.0 to 2.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/pull/19
  • chore(deps): bump tqdm from 4.66.5 to 4.67.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/pull/18
  • chore(deps): bump rich from 13.8.1 to 13.9.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/pull/17

New Contributors

  • @pemontto made their first contribution in https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/pull/21

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for StarWarden: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bug Fix and Tag options by @PawsFunctions in https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/pull/22

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rtuszik/starwarden/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0
